summary:
Aries is a handsome Nord male follower.
This is my first mod so if anyone has any pointers it would be greatly appreciated.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.forum-signatures.com][img]http://www.forum-signatures.com/wizard2/Wizard2Sigs/20131706/51bf4c6dcca63.jpg[/img][/url]


Hello this is my first mod so if you have any help I would appreciate it.

As a woman playing Skyrim I have had my fare share of sexy female followers (yes we like looking at good looking women too) however there was a severe lack of testosterone on my adventures and so I created Aries. 

Aries is a Nord male 2h warrior. 
He starts in Steel Plate gear without a helmet and an enchanted Daedric Great sword. You can give him any gear better than this and he will equip it, I for example put him in Nordic Carved Armor just as a personal preference. 
He can be found in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun. 

I have found him to be a very enjoyable follower to accompany me. 

Happy Adventuring :)


Mods I use:
ApachiiSkyHairMale
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1

Fine Face Textures for Men
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815//?

Natural Eyes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589//?

I think thats all of them that affect this mod :)
author: Tyri15
